answer:
Speak with your healthcare provider about your child's contraindication to receiving pertussis containing vaccines. It is important to ensure your child is protected against the diseases contained in the DTaP-HB-IPV-Hib combination vaccine. You can speak with a nurse at a health unit; find the clinic nearest you here.
Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids Adsorbed (DT) (for pediatric use children up to 7 years of age) is not available in Canada. In BC, the Tetanus and Diphtheria (Td) Vaccine can be given to people who are at least 7 years old. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Speak with your healthcare provider about your child's contraindication to receiving pertussis containing vaccines.

It is important to ensure your child is protected against the diseases contained in the DTaP-HB-IPV-Hib combination vaccine.
You can speak with a nurse at a health unit;find the clinic nearest you here.
Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids Adsorbed (DT) (for pediatric use children up to 7 years of age) is not available in Canada.

## In BC, the Tetanus and Diphtheria (Td) Vaccine can be given to people who are at least 7 years old.


## Immunization Nurse
